Text.Page:
, the recipe is complete!
Meet me on the Island of Dawn.

- Olivung

You obtained a Searing Fangspawn's Fire Sac, and successfully retrieved the last piece of the Aspiration Stone.

Before leaving the Island of Dawn, you received a special gift from Olivung, a lunchbox for Meren.

, you're here just in time! I've finished developing my latest recipe.

I call it 'Hell's Wings!'

I just need you to get a {@linkcreature:13#7006#Searing Fangspawn}'s Fire Sac.

Take care of yourself out there.

Job well done.

The heat is blistering!

They say that a Searing Fangspawn's Fire Sac is the most powerful taste one can expereince without dying.

Just give me one minute!"Umm... alright."

Argh! That almost burned my whiskers off!

Here, try it!
I want every gourmet in the land to experience this treat!

You have to be very cautious when handling a Searing Fangspawn's Fire Sac. It's so insanely hot, it could turn your dish to ashes.

Don't worry. You're looking at the world's greatest chef! It's going to be crispy on the outside, soft and moist on the inside. You won't believe what you're tasting!"It's a little spicy."

Nice feedback!

I'm thinking it would go well with a sweet sauce.

Thank you.

Now that I'm done with the main dishes for the banquet, I should prepare some side dishes."Going back to Velika?"

Eventually. I have some more work to do.

I've packed a lunchbox with all the dishes I made today. Please give this to Meren.

Don't worry! I made one for you, too.

Ah, and of course, here's the last piece of the stone. I'm looking forward to watching the goddess trying my dishes while wearing the Eternal Crown!

Olivung's finally finished? Let me try...

(Meren samples the dishes)
...These are so good! Such amazing flavors! I don't have to worry about the cuisine now.

What ingredients did he use to make these?"Well..."

A Bloodbound Teralith's Core, and...what did you say?

...Searing Fangspawn's Fire Sac and a Fimbrilisk's..."Is there a problem?"

I may need to reconsider Olivung's menu choices.

These dishes use extremely rare ingredients, and I've got hundreds of people to feed.

I'll talk with Olivung about possible substitutions.

Did you find the Aspiration Stone?"Here it is."

We're almost there.

Take this, it should help you retrieve the other stones.
I'll let you know when I have more information.
May the Goddess be with you.
